### Recommended Readings

2. [Disinformation's spread: bots, trolls and all of us. K. Starbird (2019)](https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-019-02235-x)

3. [Technology and democracy: Understanding the influence of online technologies on political behaviour and decision-making. S. Lewandowsky, et al. (2020) Chapter 6: Misinformation and disinformation](https://publications.jrc.ec.europa.eu/repository/handle/JRC122023)
